snippet: The defense secretary, who has been cautioning about the impact of cuts for months, said in a speech that “this is not a game, this is reality.”
lead_paragraph: The defense secretary, who has been cautioning about the impact of cuts for months, said in a speech that “this is not a game, this is reality.”

headline.seo: Panetta Warns of Dire Consequences to Military From Cuts
headline.main: Panetta Warns of Dire Consequences to Military From Budget Cuts
